hymn.title: Out of the Ground God Caused to Grow

layout.singingstanza: Out of the ground God caused to grow E -- ve -- ry tree plea -- sant to see And good for food! God made them so! Plea -- sant and good for you and me! Out of the ground God caused to grow E -- ve -- ry tree plea -- sant to see And good for food! God made them so! Plea -- sant and good for you and me!
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2012 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: Out of the ground God caused to grow Every tree pleasant to see And good for food! God made them so! Pleasant and good for you and me! (repeat)
